content.rendered:
Our general manager Georgia is your go-to girl for all queries regarding appointments and has a warming welcome to all clients. With strong product knowledge, Georgia is always ensuring a smooth guest experience in salon as well as being helpful in consulting clients on home hair-care and professional products.

The front desk team of Georgia and Angela (Reubens wife) have over 10 years’ experience working at Luxe are the people to go to when organizing your visit to the salon.

Whether it be “who’s great with short hair?” or “I have had a colour disaster I need someone to save me”, they will patiently and sympathetically handle any needs you have of Luxe.

excerpt.rendered: Our General manager Georgia, is your go-to girl for all queries and information for everything Luxe.
